page.title: 04FARMING 3
page.content: The farm{buildings}are generally in a good state of repair and are used as grain and hay stores and as shelter for farm equipment.There were no obviously ancient barns.Most barns were of steel girder construction. The{Forestry}Commission is engaged in the plantation of timber resources especially in the south of the area and on the shores of Burrator Reservoir.Active work on timber production was in progress. The farms in the area appeared to have no{financial}problem in terms of maintenance except for one farm in the Eggworthy area. This small farm was forced to the expedient of using old corrugated iron sheeting for its fencing in places. No facilities here for bulk storage. Several small sheds in great need of repair - some obsolete farm machinery.
